snippet.title: Iron Meat - Official Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Watch the new Iron Meat trailer to see slick, gruesome animation of terrifying creatures, gameplay, combat, and formidable foes from this upcoming run 'n' gun shooter game. Iron Meat will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PS4 (PlayStation 4) in late 2024. Iron Meat is a run-and-gun arcade shooter that immerses players in an apocalyptic future overrun by "The Meat," an iron-ravenous mass mutating everything in its path. Blast your way through retro-inspired stages and bosses to uncover the shocking horrors behind secret experiments on the Moon.
